article.title: Frontier Systems to Upgrade Two Unmanned Helicopters
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Frontier Systems, Irvine, California, has been awarded a nearly $14 million contract for the upgrade of two YMQ-18A unmanned helicopters to modified Block II configuration.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
